title: This Is NBA Playoffs 'Jeopardy' | The Answer
description:
Chris and Seerat start the pod by reacting to the news that Paul George will be out for the Clippers-Pelicans play-in game. Next they engage in a 'Jeopardy'-style question and answer format in making their predictions for the upcoming NBA playoffs. They touch on a myriad of subjects, including the MVP race(4:31), Doc Rivers (23:13), their picks to win the Finals(39:09), and much more.
Hosts: Chris Ryan and Seerat Sohi
Producer: Chris Sutton
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
